title: Treasure of the Caribbean Seas [FINAL] 2013 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
In the warmth of a Caribbean island, teenage siblings Allan and Morgane search for clues from the past to understand their heritage in Treasure of the Caribbean Seas, a treacherous and engaging hidden object adventure. They find all sorts of interesting tools, including maps and pages from the captain's logbook. Thomas de Granpre was the ancestor of Allan and Morgain and the captain of a ship full of treasure that he abandoned in 1778. He has left them many intriguing clues to follow. Along the way they encounter ancestors of the pirate Matheis who believe they have a claim to the loot too.
Allan is 16 and Morgane is his 18-year-old sister. Together they explore the family home where their father grew up as the son of Captain Thomas de GranprÃƒÂ©. Inside the house, Allan and Morgane find a map of the island that they use to explore different buildings on the family property and then surrounding towns.
As you explore with the teenagers, collect envelopes with lists of objects to find. In each level, discover more pages to the log that will fill in the picture of the past. Can you help Allan and Morgane piece it all together?

Game Features:
***************
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Explore a warm and colourful island in search of ancestral booty hidden on a historic ship.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play more than 10 original puzzles of words, music, and riddles.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Collect the missing pages of the captain's log to understand what happened.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from Normal or Expert modes of play for more or less access to hints and hot spots.
